subject: Project Kickoff Meeting - Agenda Required
body:
Hi Team,

I'd like to schedule our project kickoff meeting for next week. Can everyone please share their availability for Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon?

Also, please send me any agenda items you'd like to discuss. We need to cover:
- Project timeline
- Resource allocation
- Key milestones

Looking forward to working with you all!

Best,
Alice

body:

subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You've Won $1,000,000!!!
body:
Dear Winner,

You have been selected as the lucky winner of our international lottery! To claim your prize of $1,000,000, please send your bank details and processing fee of $500.

ACT NOW! This offer expires in 24 hours!

Click here to claim your prize!

Best Regards,
Prize Department

subject: URGENT: Q4 Report Deadline - Friday
body:
Hi,

Just a reminder that the Q4 financial report is due this Friday, November 24th by 5 PM.

Please ensure you:
1. Complete all expense reports
2. Submit budget projections for 2026
3. Review and sign off on the draft document I sent last week

Let me know if you need any clarification.

Thanks,
Bob

subject: Re: Partnership Proposal - Next Steps
body:
Hi,

Thank you for the detailed proposal. Our team has reviewed it and we're excited to move forward!

Could you please send over:
- Draft contract for legal review
- Timeline with key milestones
- Contact information for your project manager

We'd like to have everything finalized by mid-December. Does that work for your team?

Best regards,
Sarah

subject: You have 12 new profile views
body:
Hi there,

Your profile is getting attention! You have 12 new profile views this week.

- John Doe viewed your profile
- Jane Smith viewed your profile
- And 10 others...

Update your profile to make a great impression!

[View Profile] | [Update Profile]

Best,
The LinkedIn Team

subject: Follow-up: Demo Feedback
body:
Hello,

Thank you for the product demo yesterday. The team was impressed with the features.

We do have a few questions:
1. Can the system integrate with our existing CRM?
2. What's the typical implementation timeline?
3. Do you offer training for our staff?

Could we schedule a technical deep-dive call next week to discuss these points?

Regards,
David

subject: 50% OFF Everything! Limited Time Only!
body:

50% OFF EVERYTHING IN STORE!

subject: Action Required: Complete Annual Performance Review
body:
Dear Team Member,

It's time for your annual performance review. Please complete the following by November 30th:

1. Self-assessment form (link attached)
2. Goal setting worksheet for 2026
3. Schedule 1-on-1 meeting with your manager

Your manager will also complete their assessment by the same date. The review meeting will be scheduled in early December.

Please reach out if you have any questions.

Best,
Emily Rodriguez
Human Resources

subject: Invoice #INV-2025-1123 - Payment Reminder
body:
Hello,

This is a friendly reminder that Invoice #INV-2025-1123 for $5,400 is due on November 28, 2025.

Payment details:
- Amount: $5,400.00
- Due Date: November 28, 2025
- Invoice Date: November 1, 2025
- Terms: Net 30

Please let me know if you need a copy of the invoice or have any questions.

Thank you,
Michael Brown
Accounts Receivable

subject: Campaign Launch - Need Your Approval
body:
Hi,

We're ready to launch the holiday campaign next Monday, November 27th. Before we proceed, I need your approval on:

1. Final creative assets (attached)
2. Budget allocation ($15K for ads, $5K for influencers)
3. Target audience segments

Can you review and confirm by end of day Thursday? We need to submit everything to the ad platforms by Friday morning.

Thanks!
Lisa

subject: Security Alert: Password Reset Required
body:
SECURITY NOTICE

Due to recent security updates, all employees must reset their passwords by November 25, 2025.

Password requirements:
- Minimum 12 characters
- Include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols
- Cannot reuse last 5 passwords

To reset your password, visit: [Internal Portal Link]

If you need assistance, contact IT Support at ext. 5555.

Thank you,
IT Security Team

body:

Early bird tickets now available:

Early bird pricing ends December 15, 2025!

subject: Contract Review Needed - Urgent
body:
Hi,

I need your input on the vendor contract for the new software platform. There are a few clauses that concern me:

1. Data ownership rights (Section 7.2)
2. Termination conditions (Section 12.1)
3. Liability limitations (Section 15)

Can we schedule a 30-minute call today or tomorrow to discuss? This is blocking the procurement process.

Please let me know your availability.

Thanks,
Jennifer Lee
Legal Department

subject: Weekly Summary: 5 tasks due this week
body:

- Update project documentation (Due: Nov 24)

- Finalize roadmap for Q1 2026 (Due: Nov 29)

Overdue Tasks: 2
- Risk assessment report
- Team training schedule
